I likes... Have version 2.0.1.0... But 90% of the XML I want to examine is in the clipboard!  Ctrl-v to create a new temp document and paste in the clipboard contents!  PLEASE!

Comments.Message: Thanks, glad you like it.  I can definitely add this, it would be handy.
